description: Triangle giving a(n,k) = number of k-colored labeled graphs with n nodes.
references: R. C. Read, The number of k-colored graphs on labeled nodes, Canad. J. Math., 12 (1960), 410-414.
mathematica: a[n_ /; n >= 1, k_ /; k >= 1] := a[n, k] = Sum[ Binomial[n, r]*2^(r*(n - r))*a[r, k - 1], {r, 1, n - 1}]; a[_, 0] = 1; Flatten[ Table[ a[n, k], {n, 1, 8}, {k, 0, n - 1}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 12 2011, after formula *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
